XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle mod/bim. At least the first version. Getting a bit further along.

TABLE.NAME: bim
TABLE.COMMENT: bim allows each activity to manage/mark/aggregate collections of feeds

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course bim activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name field for moodle instances

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: General introduction of the bim activity

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the intro field (MOODLE, HTML, MARKDOWN...)

FIELD.NAME: register_feed
FIELD.COMMENT: Can the student register their feed

FIELD.NAME: mirror_feed
FIELD.COMMENT: Should we mirror the feeds of all the students

FIELD.NAME: change_feed
FIELD.COMMENT: Can the student's change their feed

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The max grade (or scale) to be used for this bim activity

TABLE.NAME: bim_student_feeds
TABLE.COMMENT: Store information about the individual feeds that make up this BIM activity

FIELD.NAME: bim
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the bim table - find the id for the activity

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the user who registered the blog

TABLE.NAME: bim_marking
TABLE.COMMENT: Hold marking and other details about individual student blog posts that have been allocated to a particular question (i.e. the post is the student's answer)

FIELD.NAME: bim
FIELD.COMMENT: id bim activity

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID for the author/student

FIELD.NAME: marker
FIELD.COMMENT: Userid of the marker who has made comments (NULL if no marking)

FIELD.NAME: question
FIELD.COMMENT: ID for the question in the bim_question table. A question that is unallocated would have a null value

FIELD.NAME: mark
FIELD.COMMENT: The mark assigned by the marker for the question

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: What status is the marking/post in?

FIELD.NAME: timemarked
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when post was marked

FIELD.NAME: timereleased
FIELD.COMMENT: date/time when post was most recently released

FIELD.NAME: link
FIELD.COMMENT: The link to the post on the student's blog

FIELD.NAME: timepublished
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when student posted the blog post

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: Title of feed item

FIELD.NAME: post
FIELD.COMMENT: The student's blog post

FIELD.NAME: comments
FIELD.COMMENT: Marker's comments on the post

TABLE.NAME: bim_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: The list of questions students are expected to respond to.

FIELD.NAME: bim
FIELD.COMMENT: id for the bim table - tells us which course/bim instance/module the questions are for

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The header/title of the question

FIELD.NAME: body
FIELD.COMMENT: The text/description of the question BIM will attempt to match this with student post content for allocation purposes

FIELD.NAME: min_mark
FIELD.COMMENT: The minimum mark that can be assigned ?? not sure this will last

FIELD.NAME: max_mark
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum mark that can be awarded

TABLE.NAME: bim_group_allocation
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The group being allocated

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The marker being allocated
